text: i'm hamza mimi i'm a senior solution

two and a half years
as solution architect we actually juggle
with many hats and in that sense we can
have
different roles we can be
builders but we can also be

team
we have that flair of public service as

impact us as citizens

telecommunication industry
on different projects on different roles

basically there is

aws is a huge company however we still
